com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast

Class WOWZBroadcast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WOWZBroadcast

  • public class WOWZBroadcast
extends java.lang.Object
    Use the WOWZBroadcast class to configure and control live streaming broadcasts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean LOG_STAT_SAMPLES
      Set to true to log detailed information about the network performance samples collected during a broadcast.
      static boolean LOG_STAT_SUMMARY
      Set to true to log summary information at the end of a broadcast.
      static boolean LOG_WOWZ_MESSAGES
      Deprecated. 
      Use setLogLevel(int) instead.

        Parameters:
        broadcastConfig - The configuration settings to use.

      • registerAdaptiveFrameRateListener

        public void registerAdaptiveFrameRateListener(WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener listener)
        Registers a WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener to get callbacks on the adaptive bitrate mechanism. Gives you the ability to influence the decisions derived from our adaptive bitrate algorithm.
        Parameters:
        listener - The WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener listener that will handle frame-rate modifications.

      • registerAdaptiveBitRateListener

        public void registerAdaptiveBitRateListener(WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener listener)
        Registers a WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener to get callbacks on the adaptive bitrate mechanism. Gives you the ability to influence the decisions derived from our adaptive bitrate algorithm.
        Parameters:
        listener - The WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener listener that will handle bitrate modifications.

      • unregisterAdaptiveBitRateListener

        public void unregisterAdaptiveBitRateListener(WOWZBroadcastAPI.AdaptiveChangeListener listener)
        Removes an adaptive bitrate listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.

      • unregisterAdaptiveFrameRateListener

        Removes an adaptive framerate listener.
        Parameters:

      • sendDataEvent

        public void sendDataEvent(WOWZDataScope eventScope,
                          java.lang.String eventName,
                          WOWZDataMap eventParams,
                          WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback resultCallback)
        Sends a data event with the specified scope, name, parameters, and result callback.
        Parameters:
        eventScope - One of WOWZDataScope.STREAM or WOWZDataScope.MODULE, the scope to which the event applies. If eventScope is WOWZDataScope#STREAM, the resultCallback parameter must be null.
        eventName - The name of the event to send.
        eventParams - A name/value pair hash map of the event's parameters.
        resultCallback - An implementation of the WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback interface whose WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback#onWZDataEventResult method will be invoked upon receiving a resulting response from the server.

      • sendDataEvent

        public void sendDataEvent(WOWZDataScope eventScope,
                          java.lang.String eventName,
                          WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback resultCallback)
        Sends a data event with the specified scope, name, and result callback.
        Parameters:
        eventScope - One of WOWZDataScope.STREAM or WOWZDataScope.MODULE, the scope to which the event applies. If eventScope is WOWZDataScope#STREAM, the resultCallback parameter must be null.
        eventName - The name of the event to send.
        resultCallback - An implementation of the WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback interface whose WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback#onWZDataEventResult method will be invoked upon receiving a resulting response from the server.

      • sendDataEvent

        public void sendDataEvent(WOWZDataScope eventScope,
                          java.lang.String eventName,
                          WOWZDataMap eventParams)
        Sends a data event with the specified scope, name, and parameters.
        Parameters:
        eventScope - One of WOWZDataScope.STREAM or WOWZDataScope.MODULE, the scope to which the event applies.
        eventName - The name of the event to send.
        eventParams - A name/value pair hash map of the event's parameters.

      • sendDataEvent

        public void sendDataEvent(WOWZDataScope eventScope,
                          java.lang.String eventName)
        Sends a data event with the specified scope, name, and parameters.
        Parameters:
        eventScope - One of WOWZDataScope.STREAM or WOWZDataScope.MODULE, the scope to which the event applies.
        eventName - The name of the event.

      • registerDataEventListener

        public void registerDataEventListener(java.lang.String eventName,
                                      WOWZDataEvent.EventListener eventListener)
        Registers a data event listener to be invoked upon receiving a specified data event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The name of the event.
        eventListener - A callback instance to be invoked when the event is received.

      • unregisterDataEventListener

        public void unregisterDataEventListener(java.lang.String eventName,
                                        WOWZDataEvent.EventListener eventListener)
        Unregisters a data event listener.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The name of the event.
        eventListener - A previously registered data event listener.

      • sendPingRequest

        public void sendPingRequest(WOWZDataEvent.ResultCallback resultCallback)
        Pings the server and returns the result to the specified callback. The result, in milliseconds, will be available in a responseTime property present in the parameters sent to the resultCallback.
        Parameters:
        resultCallback - A callback to be invoked with the results of the request. The responseTime property of the result parameters passed to the callback will contain the response time, in milliseconds.
